name: PreviewCardTrigger
description:
A link that opens the preview card.
Renders an `<a>` element.

handle.description: A handle to associate the trigger with a preview card.

payload.description: A payload to pass to the preview card when it is opened.

delay.description: How long to wait before the preview card opens. Specified in milliseconds.

closeDelay.description: How long to wait before closing the preview card. Specified in milliseconds.

className.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the component’s state.

style.detailedType:
| React.CSSProperties
| ((
    state: PreviewCard.Trigger.State,
  ) => CSSProperties | undefined)
| undefined

render.description:
Allows you to replace the component’s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.
render.detailedType:
| ReactElement
| ((
    props: HTMLProps,
    state: PreviewCard.Trigger.State,
  ) => ReactElement)

data-popup-open.description: Present when the corresponding preview card is open.
